mainHero.title: Welcome to ResearchNexus
mainHero.subtitle: Empower Your ResearchNexus Journey
mainHero.description: ResearchNexus is a AI-powered tool for the research community, where users can access research papers and datasets. It enables secure collaboration using annotation tools, with features like room creation and a playground for adding and discussing datasets, all while ensuring data privacy and security.

items.title: ArXiv Research Paper Analyzer
items.description: Explore and search research papers in collaboration with ArXiv Research Papers. Search efficiently using tags filtered by AI-generated keywords using NLP.

items.title: Collaborative Playground
items.description: Add and share datasets, ask questions, and collaborate with the community. Our interactive playground fosters innovation, allowing users to test models and discuss solutions in real-time.

items.title: AI Recommendation System
items.description: Our recommendation system uses machine learning to generate recommendations based on user preferences and contextual information, helping users find relevant research papers to explore and discuss.

items.title: Collaborative Annotating
items.description: Our collaborative annotating feature allows users to add annotations to datasets, share them with others, and discuss the content in real-time. This feature enhances the research experience by enabling collaborative learning and knowledge sharing.
